description:
Instance resize command failed with error as 'host key verification '

It looks Openstack uses Nova user to copy / migrate instance when it's resized.

There is no documentation which suggest to setup Nova user with ssh permission,

Even after adding key-based login between compute instance, ssh fails as it's using some different password apart from one set in nova.conf for NOVA user.
title: instance resize failed with error  'host key verification failed'

comments.content:

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vicky-pawar

comments.content:
cat  /var/lib/nova/.ssh/config 
Host *
StrictHostKeyChecking no
#UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null

Add this file to all computenodes
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~gnomino
